adrFormatAddress: 1568 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: The morning of 07/13/2023 at approx 6:30am the attendant working in the parking garage office was pleasant, kind and attentive. The gentleman working the parking garage on 07/13/2023 at approx 3:30pm when I went to retrieve my car was very rude and unprofessional. It was confusing as to where to pay the cash payments and asking him for assistance was like asking him to remove his arm. He told me he could not take my payment and I had to pay at the machine but just pointed in a direction and walked away! Only getting three stars because the morning attendant was so pleasant.

originalText.text: Its a parking garage , not mich you should expect for the aesthetics of the place.  I park here for work a lot.  Its usually full but you can leave your keys and get a ticket. They double park your car and later will put it in a spot. When you come to get your car they tell you what floor it is on. Elevator is very slow. Overall its just a parking garage. Of you work close its worth the thirty dollars for the day.

originalText.text:
We used this garage when we visited Sinai Hospital.
Finding a weekday parking spot is like looking for the lost grail.
Entering early gets you the special rate of twenty dollars for the day as opposed to the twelve dollars per half hour rate.
Do not be intimidated by the fact that the levels are super crowded. Monthly pass cars not able to find a regular spot  are parked in what is the up lane so there is only one lane left for cars to go up and go down!
Daily users go up to the roof level where there are plenty of spaces. Take the elevator down.
Credit cards are accepted.
Took one star off for the overcrowding leading to only one lane.

originalText.text:
Parking attendant alex castillo (Hispanic kid in 20s) took $74 in cash from me on Sun Jan 26th for parking for 24 hrs + 7 hrs (total 31hrs) and demanded cash coz credit card was not working.

Background: using app "best parking" i bought 24hrs parking from Jan 23rd to 24th and since i was gonna stay over 24 hrs  at mount sinai hospital I asked a attendant  on 23rd (mature guy with specks) if i need to take out my car and repark and he said not needed. he said u need to pay difference when parking date/time expires. according to him and based on my calculation parking for additional 24hrs shouldn't be more than $44 mx and additional 8 hrs shouldn't have been more than $14  i.e $58.
the kid harassed me knowing i have patient waiting in wheelchair outside the hospital.

originalText.text: The staff at this location are friendly and always helpful. If you arrive early enough you can self park. If you come a little later you may have to valet park, but it is not an extra charge.

text.text: The staff at this location are friendly and always helpful. If you arrive early enough you can self park. If you come a little later you may have to valet park, but it is not an extra charge.
